name: Wikipedia DWC Minimal Extension
description: Small extension for Wikipedia - Dark/Light, Width, Clarity [by Splark], designed with simplicity in mind.
additional_info:
This style is an extension, so you will need the original style :)

Make sure that it's installed after the original style (otherwise it won't work). To ensure this, disable both styles, enable Splark's style, then enable the extension.

This extension isn't complete, so don't expect perfection, but it should hopefully be useful for others!
